channel.title: Comments for page "Cato Lvl. 2"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Cato Lvl. 2"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So people have either a) been too lazy to add a page (which you could do) or b) don't have the team themselves so haven't added it yet. The OCAT summon page does not in any way suggest that it lasts the entire day on its own, it specifically states that it is expended (USED) at dayroll -unless- you have Cato in your party overnight.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: well the team is still unlinked so i wasnt sure if it was actually a team or whether that was speculation. the OCAT summon page suggests that it lasts the entire day on it's own but then needs refreshing by Cato

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: That is the stupidest thing i've heard today, Kwigyo. -.-; With TACO and Cato in the same team, forming TACOCAT, then the one summon that refreshes due to Cato during dayroll? So long as you have the team active, -he never leaves-. Thus you can do a whole day farming of TACODELUXE because OCAT is summoned for the entire day.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Shouldn't the team be removed? The OCAT summon says that it dissapears at dayroll, so you only need Cato2 to refresh it at dayroll, right?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Does anyone else think his team with tacos is only because cato can be converted into taco? Makes sense cuz of the OCAT summon. Seems like a good trivia or something
